APP.TITLE: ngTracker - The application that revamps your workflow
APP.CATCH_1: Replace pen and paper or out-of-date software to cutting-edge management system. Set up workflows with full flexibility so that they meet your business or personal needs.
APP.CATCH_2: Break the big ideas down into manageable chunks across teams with user assignment and file sharing.

ONE.TITLE: Build your road map
ONE.TEXT: Create an unlimited ammount of boards, lists and cards to manage your projets and organize your tasks

TWO.TITLE: Link users to tasks
TWO.TEXT: Make sure that each of your team members never passes over a single task

THREE.TITLE: Never miss deadlines
THREE.TEXT: Order your tasks by their importance in a couple seconds through our effortless drag-and-drop system

DEV.TITLE: Behind the scenes
DEV.PHRASE_2: Personal experience in back-end with Flask & Django. Will to dig further in both front and back-end.
DEV.PHRASE_3: Currently looking forward to join an IT company as a front-end specialist where I could blossom at my job, actively participating, sharing, and solving issues.

ONE.TITLE: FREE-OF-CHARGE LEARNING
ONE.TEXT: The RS School is working by the principle of "Pay it forward". Members of our community share their knowledge and check students' tasks for free.

TWO.TITLE: OPEN TO EVERYONE
TWO.TEXT: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence.

THREE.TITLE: WORLDWIDE MENTORS AND TRAINERS
THREE.TEXT: The Mentors and trainers of our school are front-end and javascript developers from different companies/countries.

FOUR.TITLE: CERTIFICATE
FOUR.TEXT: After accomplishing all three stages of education, students will receive an electronic certificate of completion.
